p: In the general formula (I), examples of the halo(lower alkyl) group as R 1, R 2, R 3, R 4 and R 5 include, for example, a C 1-C 6 alkyl group substituted with 1 to 6 halogen atoms such as trifluoromethyl group and pentafluoroethyl group, a C 1-C 4 alkyl group substituted with 1 to 6 halogen atoms is preferred, and trifluoromethyl group is particularly preferred.
